hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT PRCOUNT.* FROM (SELECT IG688.EIID AS PRASSETID,IG688.EINAME AS PRASSETNAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='I' or prpdid like :ipdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS incident, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='P' or prpdid like :ppdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS problem, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='C' or prpdid like :cpdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS change, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype ='D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deployment, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype in ('WA','WB') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS work FROM IG500,IG731,IG688,IG599 WHERE IG500.PRID = IG731.PRID AND IG731.EIID = IG688.EIID AND IG688.ECATEGORY = :prassetcategory AND IG731.PIID = IG599.PIID AND IG599.PIVARTYPE='4' AND IG599.PIVARVALUE='N/A'

SELECT prcount.* FROM (SELECT A.ppuserid,A.ppusername,A.incident,A.problem,A.change,A.deployment,A.work,A.ask,C.orgsyscoding as orgid,C.orgname FROM (SELECT ppuserid,ppusername, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='I' or prpdid like :ipdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS incident, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='P' or prpdid like :ppdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS problem, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='C' or prpdid like :cpdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS change, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype ='D' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS deployment, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype ='GD' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS work, SUM(CASE WHEN (prtype ='S' or prpdid like :spdid||'%') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ask FROM (SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ppuserid,ppusername,prtype,prpdid,propentime FROM IG677 WHERE ppstatus='V' AND ppproctime IS NOT NULL union all SELECT x.sfregisterid , y.username , 'GD' , '',x.sfinstime from ig933 x left join iguser y on(x.sfregisterid = y.userid) WHERE x.sfstatus = '0002' ) tempview WHERE 1=1

select pr.* from USERROLE ur inner join IG677 pr on ( pr.pproleid = ur.roleid and pr.ppproctime is null and (pr.PPUSERID is null or pr.PPUSERID='')) where ur.USERID = :userid and ur.ROLEMANAGER = '1' and pr.prstatus = pr.ppstatus

SELECT yearSummary.* FROM (SELECT A.month, CASE WHEN B.currentIncident is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.currentIncident END AS currentIncident, CASE WHEN B.precedingIncident is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.precedingIncident END AS precedingIncident, CASE WHEN B.currentProblem is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.currentProblem END AS currentProblem, CASE WHEN B.precedingProblem is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.precedingProblem END AS precedingProblem, CASE WHEN B.currentChange is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.currentChange END currentChange, CASE WHEN B.precedingChange is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.precedingChange END AS precedingChange, CASE WHEN B.currentDeployment is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.currentDeployment END AS currentDeployment, CASE WHEN B.precedingDeployment is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.precedingDeployment END AS precedingDeployment, CASE WHEN B.currentWork is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.currentWork END AS currentWork, CASE WHEN B.precedingWork is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.precedingWork END AS precedingWork, CASE WHEN B.totalCurrent is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.totalCurrent END AS totalCurrent, CASE WHEN B.totalPreceding is NULL THEN 0 ELSE B.totalPreceding END AS totalPreceding FROM (SELECT cid AS month FROM CODEDETAIL WHERE ccid = '151' ORDER BY cid ASC) A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT substr(propentime,6,2) as month, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='I' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS currentIncident, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='I' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS precedingIncident, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='P' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS currentProblem, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='P' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS precedingProblem, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='C' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS currentChange, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='C' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS precedingChange, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='D' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS currentDeployment, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype='D' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS precedingDeployment, SUM(CASE WHEN prtype like 'W%' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS currentWork , SUM(CASE WHEN prtype like 'W%' AND substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS precedingWork, SUM(CASE WHEN substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear AND prtype != 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalCurrent, SUM(CASE WHEN substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear AND prtype != 'S' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS totalPreceding FROM IG500 WHERE substr(propentime,1,4) =:currentyear OR substr(propentime,1,4) =:precedingyear group by substr(propentime,6,2) order by substr(propentime,6,2) ) B ON(A.month=B.month) ) yearSummary order by month

SELECT prcount.* FROM( SELECT orgsyscoding,orgname, SUM(incident) AS incident, SUM(serviceRequest) AS serviceRequest, SUM(incident+serviceRequest) count FROM (SELECT prorgid AS orgsyscoding,prorgname AS orgname, 0 AS incident, COUNT(1) AS serviceRequest FROM IG500 WHERE prtype ='S' and prstatus <>'D'

UNION ALL SELECT c.orgsyscoding AS orgsyscoding,c.orgname AS orgname, COUNT(1) AS incident, 0 AS serviceRequest FROM IG500 a INNER JOIN IG599 b ON(a.prid = b.prid AND b.pivarname='PRT_ORGSYSCODING' AND b.pivarvalue IS NOT NULL AND b.pivarvalue !=' ') INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION c ON(b.pivarvalue = c.orgsyscoding ) WHERE prtype ='I'
SELECT prcount.* FROM IG500 prcount WHERE 1=1

SELECT prcount.* FROM IG590 prcount INNER JOIN IG599 b ON(prcount.prid = b.prid AND b.pivarname='PRT_ORGSYSCODING' AND b.pivarvalue IS NOT NULL AND b.pivarvalue !=' ') INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION c ON(b.pivarvalue = c.orgsyscoding ) WHERE prtype ='I'

SELECT pp.* FROM IG337 pp INNER JOIN USERROLE ur ON (ur.userid = :userid AND ur.rolemanager = '1' AND pp.pproleid = ur.roleid) INNER JOIN IG500 pr ON (pr.prid = :prid) WHERE pp.prid = pr.prid AND pp.ppstatus = pr.prstatus

SELECT ur.userid,u.username,ur.roleid,r.rolename,o.orgsyscoding, o.orgname,CASE WHEN pp.ppproctime > '' THEN '2' WHEN pp.pproleid IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS doneFlag, u.usermobile,u.userinfo FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN ( SELECT pp.pproleid FROM IG337 pp INNER JOIN USERROLE ur ON (ur.userid = :userid AND ur.rolemanager = '1' AND pp.pproleid = ur.roleid) INNER JOIN IG500 pr ON (pr.prid = :prid) WHERE pp.prid = pr.prid AND pp.ppstatus = pr.prstatus GROUP BY pp.pproleid ) p ON(p.pproleid = ur.roleid) LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT pp.pproleid,pp.ppuserid,pp.ppproctime FROM IG337 pp INNER JOIN USERROLE ur ON (ur.userid = :userid AND ur.rolemanager = '1' AND pp.pproleid = ur.roleid) INNER JOIN IG500 pr ON (pr.prid = :prid) WHERE pp.prid = pr.prid AND pp.ppstatus = pr.prstatus ) pp ON(pp.pproleid = ur.roleid AND pp.ppuserid = ur.userid) INNER JOIN IGUser u ON (ur.userid = u.userid) INNER JOIN Role r ON (ur.roleid = r.roleid) INNER JOIN Organization o ON (u.orgid = o.orgsyscoding) WHERE u.deleteflag = '0' ORDER BY doneFlag DESC

SELECT ur.userid,u.username,ur.roleid,r.rolename,o.orgsyscoding, o.orgname,CASE WHEN pp.ppproctime > ' ' THEN '2' WHEN pp.pproleid IS NULL THEN '0' ELSE '1' END AS doneFlag, u.usermobile,u.userinfo FROM UserRole ur LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT pp.pproleid,pp.ppuserid,pp.ppproctime FROM IG337 pp INNER JOIN IG500 pr ON (pr.prid = :prid) WHERE pp.prid = pr.prid AND pp.ppstatus = pr.prstatus AND pp.pproleid = :roleid ) pp ON(pp.pproleid = ur.roleid AND pp.ppuserid = ur.userid) INNER JOIN IGUser u ON (ur.userid = u.userid) INNER JOIN Role r ON (ur.roleid = r.roleid) INNER JOIN Organization o ON (u.orgid = o.orgsyscoding) WHERE ur.roleid = :roleid ORDER BY doneFlag DESC
SELECT pr.* FROM IG500 pr WHERE pr.prtype = 'S'
SELECT pr.* FROM IG592 pr WHERE 1=1
SELECT DISTINCT pr.* FROM IG592 pr ,IG337 pp WHERE pr.prid = pp.prid AND pp.ppuserid = :ppuserid
SELECT count(DISTINCT pr.PRID) FROM IG592 pr ,IG337 pp WHERE pr.prid = pp.prid AND pp.ppuserid = :ppuserid
SELECT DISTINCT pr.* FROM IG592 pr ,IG337 pp WHERE pr.prid = pp.prid AND (pr.prclosetime IS NULL OR pr.prclosetime = '') AND (pp.ppproctime IS NULL) AND pp.pproleid = :roleid

SELECT pidid,psdid,roleid,pidname,pidlabel,piddesc,pidtype ,(case when defaccess = '0' then defaultaccess else defaccess end )AS pidaccess,(case when defrequired = '0' then defaultrequired else defrequired end )AS pidrequired FROM ( SELECT pidid,psdid,roleid,pidname,pidlabel,piddesc,pidtype,max(defaccess) as defaccess,max(defaultaccess) as defaultaccess,max(defrequired) as defrequired,max(defaultrequired) as defaultrequired FROM ( SELECT a.pidid,b.psdid,b.roleid,c.pidname,c.pidlabel,c.piddesc,c.pidtype,a.pidaccess as defaccess,'0' as defaultaccess,a.pidrequired as defrequired,'0' as defaultrequired FROM IG881 a INNER JOIN IG222 b ON (a.ppdid = b.ppdid) INNER JOIN IG007 c ON (a.pidid = c.pidid) WHERE b.psdid = :psdid AND b.roleid = :roleid UNION ALL SELECT a.pidid,a.psdid,cast(:roleid as Integer) as roleid,b.pidname,b.pidlabel,b.piddesc,b.pidtype,'0' as defaccess,a.pidaccess as defaultaccess,'0' as defrequired,a.pidrequired as defaultrequired FROM IG699 a INNER JOIN IG007 b ON (a.pidid = b.pidid) WHERE psdid = :psdid ) a GROUP BY pidid,psdid,roleid,pidname,pidlabel,piddesc,pidtype ) b

SELECT SELECT pi.piid, pi.prid, pidaccess as pivarname, pi.pivarlabel, pi.pivartype, pi.pivarvalue, pi.piattkey, pi.fingerprint, pi.pidid, pi.pidmode, pi.privatescope FROM( SELECT pi.*,(CASE WHEN b.defaccess > ' ' and b.defaccess > '0' THEN b.defaccess ELSE b.defaultaccess END) AS pidaccess FROM (SELECT pidid,MAX (defaccess) AS defaccess, MAX(defaultaccess) AS defaultaccess FROM (SELECT pidid,pidaccess AS defaccess,'' AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.psdcode and psd.psdmode = '1') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (ppd.psdid = psd.psdid AND ur.roleid = ppd.roleid) INNER JOIN IG881 pipd ON (pipd.psdid = psd.psdid AND pipd.ppdid = ppd.ppdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,'' AS defaccess,pidaccess AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.ROLEID = pp.PPROLEID AND pp.PRID = :prid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.PSDCODE AND psd.psdmode = '1') INNER JOIN IG699 pdv ON (psd.psdid = pdv.psdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,pidaccess defaccess,'' AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid AND pp.ppuserid = :userid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.psdcode AND psd.psdmode = '2') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (ppd.psdid = psd.psdid AND ur.roleid = ppd.roleid) INNER JOIN IG881 pipd ON (pipd.psdid = psd.psdid AND pipd.ppdid = ppd.ppdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,'' AS defaccess,pidaccess AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid AND pp.ppuserid = :userid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.PSDCODE AND psd.psdmode = '2') INNER JOIN IG699 pdv ON (psd.psdid = pdv.psdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid) a GROUP BY pidid ) b INNER JOIN IG599 pi ON (pi.pidid = b.pidid AND pi.prid = :prid) ) pi INNER JOIN IG007 PID ON (PI.PIDID = PID.PIDID) WHERE pi.pidaccess > '0' ORDER BY PIDSORTID

sum(1) as total from IG933 sf left join IG013 it on sf.sfeiid = it.eiid left join codedetail code on sf.sftype = code.syscoding left join user u on sf.SFREGISTERID = u.userid where sf.SFSTATUS='0002' and code.pcid is not null
group by code.cvalue

sum(case when sf.sfeiid =0 then 1 else 0 end)as other, sum(1) as total from IG933 sf left join IG013 it on sf.sfeiid = it.eiid left join codedetail code on sf.sftype = code.syscoding left join IG013 e on sf.sfeiid = e.eiid where sf.SFSTATUS='0002' and code.pcid is not null

select orgname,workCount from
( select pporgid ,count(pporgid) workCount from (select pr.prid,pporgid,count(pr.prid) from IG500 pr ,IG337 pp where prstatus <>'C' and pporgid<>'' and pr.prid=pp.prid and substr(pporgid,1,10)='0002001001' and length(pporgid)=13 group by pr.prid ,pporgid ) b group by pporgid ) a ,Organization where pporgid = orgsyscoding

select pr.* from IG500 pr inner join IG599 pi on (pi.prid = pr.prid and pi.PIVARTYPE='4' and pi.PIVARVALUE='N/A') where pr.prtype like :prtype||'%' and exists (select 1 from IG731 pie left join IG688 ei on pie.eiid = ei.eiid where pie.prid = pr.prid and pie.piid = pi.piid and pi.PIVARTYPE='4' and pi.PIVARVALUE='N/A' and ei.eiid = :prassetid)

SELECT pi.piid, pi.prid, pidaccess as pivarname, pi.pivarlabel, pi.pivartype, pi.pivarvalue, pi.piattkey, pi.fingerprint, pi.pidid, pi.pidmode, pi.pidcomment, pi.privatescope from( SELECT pi.*,(CASE WHEN b.defaccess > ' ' and b.defaccess<>'0' THEN b.defaccess ELSE b.defaultaccess END) AS pidaccess FROM (SELECT pidid,MAX (defaccess) AS defaccess, MAX(defaultaccess) AS defaultaccess FROM (SELECT pidid,pidaccess AS defaccess,'' AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.psdcode and psd.psdmode = '1') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (ppd.psdid = psd.psdid AND ur.roleid = ppd.roleid) INNER JOIN IG881 pipd ON (pipd.psdid = psd.psdid AND pipd.ppdid = ppd.ppdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,'' AS defaccess,pidaccess AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.ROLEID = pp.PPROLEID AND pp.PRID = :prid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.PSDCODE AND psd.psdmode = '1') INNER JOIN IG699 pdv ON (psd.psdid = pdv.psdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,pidaccess AS defaccess,'' AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid AND pp.ppuserid = :userid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.psdcode AND psd.psdmode = '2') INNER JOIN IG222 ppd ON (ppd.psdid = psd.psdid AND ur.roleid = ppd.roleid) INNER JOIN IG881 pipd ON (pipd.psdid = psd.psdid AND pipd.ppdid = ppd.ppdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid UNION ALL SELECT pidid,'' AS defaccess,pidaccess AS defaultaccess FROM UserRole ur INNER JOIN IG337 pp ON (ur.roleid = pp.pproleid AND pp.prid = :prid AND pp.ppuserid = :userid) INNER JOIN IG333 psd ON (psd.pdid = :pdid AND pp.ppstatus = psd.PSDCODE AND psd.psdmode = '2') INNER JOIN IG699 pdv ON (psd.psdid = pdv.psdid) WHERE ur.userid = :userid) a GROUP BY pidid ) b INNER JOIN IG599 pi ON (pi.pidid = b.pidid AND pi.prid = :prid) ) pi INNER JOIN IG007 PID ON (PI.PIDID = PID.PIDID) WHERE pi.pidaccess > '0' ORDER BY PIDSORTID

select prinfo.*,pnsd.psdid as pnsdpsdid,pnsd.psdconfirm as pnsdconfirm,pnsd.sms,pnsd.email,pnsd.notifyd,pnsd.notifyh,pnsd.notifym, pnsd.reportd,pnsd.reporth,pnsd.reportm,pnsd.rolemanager from ( select pr.*, pp.ppid, pp.pproleid, pp.pprolename, pp.ppuserid, pp.ppusername, pp.ppinittime, case when pp.ppsubstatus is null then '0' else pp.ppsubstatus end as ppsubstatus, pp.ppbacktime from (select A.prid, A.prtitle, A.prserialnum, B.psdid, B.pdid, B.psdname, B.psdcode, case when B.psdconfirm is null then '0' else B.psdconfirm end as psdconfirm from IG500 A left outer join IG333 B on (A.prstatus = B.psdcode and A.prstatus != 'C' AND A.PRPDID=B.PDID)) pr inner join IG337 pp on (pr.prid = pp.prid and pr.psdcode = pp.ppstatus and pp.ppproctime is null)) prinfo left outer join IG212 pnsd on ((prinfo.psdid = pnsd.psdid and prinfo.psdconfirm = '0' and prinfo.psdconfirm = pnsd.psdconfirm) or (prinfo.psdid = pnsd.psdid and prinfo.psdconfirm = '1' and prinfo.ppsubstatus = '0' and prinfo.psdconfirm = pnsd.psdconfirm) or (prinfo.psdid = pnsd.psdid and prinfo.psdconfirm = '1' and prinfo.ppsubstatus = '1' and pnsd.psdconfirm = '0') ) where (pnsd.psdid is not null or pnsd.psdid != '') and (pnsd.sms = '1' or pnsd.email = '1')
SELECT * FROM IG337 WHERE PRID = :prid AND PSDID IN (SELECT PSDID FROM IG337 WHERE PRID = :prid AND PPPROCTIME IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PSDID)
select pr.* from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid
select count(1) from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid

select distinct pr.* from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid left join ig333 psd on psd.pdid = pr.prpdid and psd.psdcode = pr.prstatus left join ig337 pp on pr.PRID = pp.prid and pp.psdid = psd.psdid

select distinct pr.* from ig500 pr left join ig337 pp on pr.PRID = pp.prid left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid left join iguser iu on pp.pporgid like (case when length(iu.orgid) > 10 then substr(iu.orgid,1,10) else iu.orgid end) || '%'
select distinct pr.* from ig500 pr left join ig380 pd on pr.prpdid = pd.pdid left join ig337 pp on pr.PRID = pp.prid left join userrole ur on ur.roleid=pp.pproleid
SELECT DISTINCT (B.PSDNAME||CASE WHEN A.PEND ='0' THEN '（挂起）' else '' END) FROM IG591 A INNER JOIN IG333 B ON (A.PSDID=B.PSDID)

with temptbale(dateMonth) as( values :MONTHS )
SELECT DATEMONTH,PRPDID,PRPDNAME,ACOUNT,CLOSECOUNT FROM temptbale M LEFT JOIN ( select substr(prpdid,1,5) AS PRPDID ,prpdname,substr(propentime,1,7) AS PROPENTIME ,count(1) AS ACOUNT ,count(prclosetime) AS CLOSECOUNT from ig500 where prpdid like :prpdid group by substr(propentime,1,7),substr(prpdid,1,5),prpdname order by substr(propentime,1,7) desc ) T ON( m.dateMonth = t.PROPENTIME) order by DATEMONTH desc

WITH formTb AS(SELECT i7.pidid,prid,pivarvalue,i7.pdid,i7.PIDNAME FROM ig007 i7 LEFT JOIN ig599 i59 ON (i7.PIDID = i59.PIDID) WHERE i7.PDID like (:pdid||'%' )), userTb as(SELECT CASE WHEN((username IS NULL or username ='') AND PPSTATUS <>'C') THEN '未指定' WHEN (username IS NOT null) THEN SUBSTR(username,1,LENGTH(username)-1) ELSE '' END AS username,prid ,PPSTATUS FROM( SELECT prid,PPSTATUS,varchar(replace(replace(replace(xml2clob(xmlagg(xmlelement(NAME a, PPUSERNAME||'、'))),'',''),'',''),'','')) username FROM IG337 WHERE Psdid like (:pdid||'%' ) GROUP BY prid ,PPSTATUS ) ) SELECT FINGERPRINT, PCODE, PRASSETCATEGORY, PRASSETID, PRASSETNAME, PRBACKPLAN, PRBUSINESS, PRCLOSETIME, PRCORID, PRCORTITLE, PRCORTYPE, PRDESC, PRDURATION, PRFACTTIME, PRID, PRIMPACT, PRIMPLPLAN, PRINFO, PROPENTIME, PRORGID, PRORGNAME, PRPDID, PRPDNAME, PRPLANTIME, PRPRIORITY, PRPTDCOND, PRROLEID, PRROLENAME, PRSERIALNUM, PRSTRATEGYVERSION, PRSUBSTATUS, PRSUBTYPE, PRTITLE, PRTYPE, PRURGENCY, PRUSERID, PRUSERNAME, PRVFYPLAN, pname, case when(pid is not null and pid <>'') then cast(pid as integer) else null end as pid, prstatus FROM ( SELECT rownumber() over() as rownumber_ , FINGERPRINT, PCODE, PRASSETCATEGORY, PRASSETID, PRASSETNAME, PRBACKPLAN, PRBUSINESS, PRCLOSETIME, PRCORID, PRCORTITLE, PRCORTYPE, PRDESC, PRDURATION, PRFACTTIME, PRID, PRIMPACT, PRIMPLPLAN, PRINFO, PROPENTIME, PRORGID, PRORGNAME, PRPDID, PRPDNAME, PRPLANTIME, PRPRIORITY, PRPTDCOND, PRROLEID, PRROLENAME, PRSERIALNUM, PRSTRATEGYVERSION, PRSUBSTATUS, PRSUBTYPE, PRTITLE, PRTYPE, PRURGENCY, PRUSERID, PRUSERNAME, PRVFYPLAN,( SELECT username FROM userTb WHERE userTb.prid = pr.prid AND userTb.PPSTATUS = pr.prstatus) AS pname ,(SELECT psdname FROM ig333 i33 WHERE i33.PSDCODE = pr.prstatus AND i33.PDID = pr.PRPDID) AS prstatus ,(SELECT pivarvalue FROM formTb WHERE formTb.prid = pr.prid AND formTb.pdid = pr.prpdid AND pidname= '指挥流程prid') AS pid FROM ig500 pr WHERE prpdid like (:pdid||'%' )
